title: Romantic Nature Retreat with Garden-to-Table Dining Experiences
description: Treat your loved one to a romantic getaway in one of New Zealandâ€™s most breathtaking landscapes. With an enviable location overlooking the Brynderwyn Ranges and out to the stunning beaches of the Mangawhai Coast, Te Arai Lodge is an eco-friendly oasis offering boutique luxury and warm hospitality, only an hour from Auckland. Reconnect with nature as you stay in a unique retreat and enjoy sumptuous daily breakfast and an authentic garden-to-table dining experience.
offer_address: 51 Lake Rd, Te Arai 0975, New Zealand
